screen_overview: Kanban-style project management board showing sprint 2023-06-30T12:31:54+0000 for PLAT board under Platform Development. Contains 3 columns (TO DO, IN PROGRESS, DONE) with 9 task cards distributed across them. Header includes navigation, sprint controls, and team member avatars. Toolbar provides search, filters, and insights access.

issues.description: Numeric indicators (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8) appear without labels or tooltips, making their meaning unclear to users
issues.recommendation: Add tooltips to all numeric badges explaining what they represent (e.g., comments, subtasks, story points). Consider adding small icon prefixes to provide visual context.

issues.description: No help documentation, tooltips, or legend visible anywhere on the interface
issues.recommendation: Implement comprehensive tooltip system for all interactive elements. Add help icon in header linking to documentation. Create legend for icons, colors, and metrics.

issues.description: Warning icons appear on cards without explanation of the issue or how to resolve it
issues.recommendation: Add descriptive tooltips to warning icons explaining the specific problem. Provide actionable steps for resolution. Consider adding a problems panel.

issues.description: Label badge colors don't follow consistent semantic system (red used for both CLOUD and PRODUCTS, no clear categorization)
issues.recommendation: Establish semantic color system based on task categories. Document color meanings. Ensure colors are used consistently across the application.

issues.description: Task cards are information-dense with 7+ data points, creating cognitive overload and reducing scanning efficiency
issues.recommendation: Implement progressive disclosure - show only essential info by default (title, label, assignee). Reveal additional details on hover. Add compact/detailed view toggle.

issues.description: Avatar border colors vary (blue, purple, green) without documented meaning or clear pattern
issues.recommendation: Standardize avatar border colors with clear semantic meaning (e.g., role, status, team). Document the system in help resources.

issues.description: Icon meanings must be memorized - no recognition aids provided (checkmarks, trends, warnings)
issues.recommendation: Add tooltips to all icons. Create icon legend accessible from toolbar. Use more descriptive icons or add text labels for clarity.

issues.description: Sprint deadline '0 days remaining' shown in small text without visual urgency indicators
issues.recommendation: Increase size and prominence of deadline indicator. Add color coding (red for urgent). Include progress bar showing sprint timeline. Consider countdown timer.

issues.description: Avatar group in toolbar has significant overlap, making individual team members difficult to identify
issues.recommendation: Reduce overlap percentage. Add tooltip showing all team members on hover. Consider expandable avatar list for better visibility.

issues.description: No visible keyboard shortcuts or efficiency features for power users
issues.recommendation: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions. Add quick actions on card hover. Enable bulk selection. Provide keyboard shortcut reference.

issues.description: Filter button states don't clearly indicate whether they are active or inactive
issues.recommendation: Add visual highlighting to active filters. Show filter count when active. Add 'Clear all filters' button when filters are applied.

issues.description: Cards are tightly packed vertically with minimal spacing, reducing visual breathing room
issues.recommendation: Increase vertical spacing between cards to 16-20px. Add more padding within cards. Consider adding subtle separators.

issues.description: Timestamp format (2023-06-30T12:31:54+0000) is technical and not user-friendly
issues.recommendation: Show relative dates alongside technical timestamp (e.g., 'Sprint ending today'). Use more readable date format for primary display.

issues.description: No confirmation dialog visible for potentially destructive 'Complete sprint' action
issues.recommendation: Add confirmation dialog showing summary of incomplete tasks before completing sprint. Warn about consequences of action.

issues.description: IN PROGRESS column appears overloaded with 5 tasks, suggesting potential workflow bottleneck
issues.recommendation: Add WIP (Work In Progress) limits to columns. Highlight when limits are exceeded. Provide visual indicators for column load.
